chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21 5G is experiencing the following issue:
The phone no longer recognizes the SIM card (tried another SIM from my professional phone = same pb). The phone's charge is random and slow when changing cables.

Thank you for your help,

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
Autre.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our team is unable to repair the device.

The device was purchased as an EXCELLENT condition. According to the Quality Charter, EXCELLENT condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €60 deduction is reasonable. Please check with the customer and get back to me. 

Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

You do not have the right to subtract an amount . The customer is under warranty and would like a repair, so if you have to reimburse him, do so in full. 

Regards,
Ali-Samuel from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange hence we would like to partially refund the customer instead.

As mentioned above, the device was purchased as an EXCELLENT condition. According to the Quality Charter, EXCELLENT condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.The device has visible scratches upon return, thus the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €60 deduction is reasonable. Please check with the customer and get back to me.

Regards,
YR

Dear ecomobile

You do not have the right to subtract an amount. The customer is under warranty and would like a repair, so if you have to reimburse him, do so in full.

Or we will be obliged to refund the order ourselves 

Regards,
Ali-Samuel from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange hence we would like to partially refund the customer instead. 

As mentioned above, the device was purchased in an EXCELLENT condition. According to the Quality Charter, EXCELLENT condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.T he device has visible scratches upon return, thus the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition. 

We understand that the situation is not ideal and we are willing to reduce the deduction to 50 euros. Please check with the customer and get back to me. 

Regards, 
RK
